name: Jafar
description: King's Evil Vizier. Cunning and Ambitious. Tall slender figure, permanent sneer on his face, unless he's talking to someone above his station, then - obsequious smile.

powers.title: Small Fireball
powers.description: Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source.

powers.title: Shield
powers.description: Create a force field around a target creature or an object. Resists up to 8 damage.  Always has clean air inside. Lasts for an hour, or until it takes more than 8 damage.

powers.title: Embody fear
powers.description: The target person/creature see the image of whatever they fear the most.

powers.title: Major Illusion
powers.description: Create an object no larger than an elephant, complete with sounds, smells, movement.

powers.title: Charm Person
powers.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know they’ve been charmed.

name: Gretchen
description: A mean old hag, Jafar's partner in crime.

powers.title: Electricute
powers.description: A bolt of lightning strikes it from the sky or from your hands, dealing damage and melting metallic objects.

powers.title: Stun
powers.description: Stun the target creature for 1 minute. It's unable to move or do anything.

powers.title: Darkness
powers.description: Create a field of magical darkness 10 meters in diameter.

powers.title: Petrify
powers.description: Turns a non-magical creature or an object (no larger than a barrel) you’re touching into stone for the next 5 minutes.

name: Guz
description: Gretchen's Minion. Can be violent, stupid, but loyal to Gretchen. Easily tricked.

powers.title: Body Builder
powers.description:
You're as strong as a good bodybuilder. You can do what a good bodybuilder can do.
Like lift and throw that big rock or tip over a cow.

powers.title: Reckless Attack
powers.description: Attack without concern for your life - deals double damage but makes you vulnerable to a counterattack.

powers.title: Parry
powers.description: Deflect melee attack from an equally skilled opponent.

powers.title: Whirldwind
powers.description: Allows you to make a melee attack to everyone within reach.

powers.title: Charge
powers.description: You charge in a straight line towards the selected enemy and smash into them. The enemy, everyone on your path, and everyone within reach gets knocked down, losing their next turn.

name: Guard
description: Just a guard, doing his job.

powers.title: Reckless Attack
powers.description: Attack without concern for your life - deals double damage but makes you vulnerable to a counterattack.

powers.title: Parry
powers.description: Deflect melee attack from an equally skilled opponent.

powers.title: Knock Down
powers.description: You charge in a straight line towards the selected enemy and smash into them. The enemy gets knocked down, losing their next turn.
